snippet: A suicide bomber set off a car full of explosives at a church in northern Nigeria on Sunday, killing at least 12 people in the latest attack on Christian worshipers, witnesses said.
abstract: Suicide bomber drives car packed with explosives into northern Nigeria church, killing at least 12 people in the latest attack on Christian worshipers; it is not clear who is responsible for the attack, although churches have been singled out by militant Islamist group Boko Haram.
lead_paragraph: A suicide bomber set off a car full of explosives at a church in northern Nigeria on Sunday, killing at least 12 people in the latest attack on Christian worshipers, witnesses said.

headline.main: Bomber Strikes Nigerian Church, as Attacks on Christians Mount
headline.print_headline: Bomber Strikes Nigerian Church, As Attacks on Christians Mount
